alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:42PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam affecting Union and Ashley Counties. For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Monroe, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 69.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning and continue rising to 72.0 feet Wednesday, April 27. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 70.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 72.2 feet on 05/19/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 945 PM CDT.
